alert.note: Alert for Davidson (Tennessee) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Severe Thunderstorm Warning issued February 16 at 2:59PM CST until February 16 at 3:30PM CST by NWS Nashville
info.description: The National Weather Service in Nashville has issued a * Severe Thunderstorm Warning for... Central Davidson County in Middle Tennessee... * Until 330 PM CST. * At 259 PM CST, a severe thunderstorm was located near Belle Meade, or 7 miles west of Nashville, moving east at 40 mph. HAZARD...60 mph wind gusts. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Expect damage to roofs, siding, and trees. * Locations impacted include... Nashville, Madison, Goodlettsville, Belle Meade, Berry Hill, Bells Bend and Whites Creek. HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...<.75 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...60 MPH
info.instruction: A Tornado Watch remains in effect until 700 PM CST for Middle Tennessee. For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building. A Tornado Watch remains in effect until 700 PM CST for Middle Tennessee.
